sn41.3:4.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ sambahulā therā bhikkhū macchikāsaṇḍe viharanti ambāṭakavane.
sn41.3:4.2: Atha kho citto gahapati yena therā bhikkhū tenupasaṅkami;
sn41.3:4.3: upasaṅkamitvā there bhikkhū abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
sn41.3:4.4: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho citto gahapati there bhikkhū etadavoca:
sn41.3:4.7: Atha kho citto gahapati therānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ adhivāsanaṃ viditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā there bhikkhū abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
sn41.3:4.8: Atha kho therā bhikkhū tassā rattiyā accayena pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena cittassa gahapatissa nivesanaṃ tenupasaṅkamiṃsu;
sn41.3:5.1: Atha kho citto gahapati yena therā bhikkhū tenupasaṅkami;
sn41.3:5.2: upasaṅkamitvā there bhikkhū abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
sn41.3:5.3: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho citto gahapati āyasmantaṃ theraṃ etadavoca:
sn41.3:5.4: “yā imā, bhante thera, anekavihitā diṭṭhiyo loke uppajjanti:
sn41.3:5.5: ‘sassato lokoti vā, asassato lokoti vā, antavā lokoti vā, anantavā lokoti vā, taṃ jīvaṃ taṃ sarīranti vā, aññaṃ jīvaṃ aññaṃ sarīranti vā, hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti vā, na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti vā, hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti vā, neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’ti vā.
sn41.3:5.6: Yāni cimāni dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhigatāni brahmajāle bhaṇitāni;
sn41.3:5.7: imā nu kho, bhante, diṭṭhiyo kismiṃ sati honti, kismiṃ asati na hontī”ti?
sn41.3:6.1: Evaṃ vutte, āyasmā thero tuṇhī ahosi.
sn41.3:6.3: tatiyampi kho citto gahapati āyasmantaṃ theraṃ etadavoca:
sn41.3:6.4: “yā imā, bhante thera, anekavihitā diṭṭhiyo loke uppajjanti—
sn41.3:6.5: sassato lokoti vā, asassato lokoti vā, antavā lokoti vā, anantavā lokoti vā, taṃ jīvaṃ taṃ sarīranti vā, aññaṃ jīvaṃ aññaṃ sarīranti vā, hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti vā, na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti vā, hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti vā, neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti vā.
sn41.3:6.6: Yāni cimāni dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhigatāni brahmajāle bhaṇitāni;
sn41.3:6.7: imā nu kho, bhante, diṭṭhiyo kismiṃ sati honti, kismiṃ asati na hontī”ti?
sn41.3:6.8: Tatiyampi kho āyasmā thero tuṇhī ahosi.
sn41.3:7.1: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā isidatto tasmiṃ bhikkhusaṅghe sabbanavako hoti.
sn41.3:7.2: Atha kho āyasmā isidatto āyasmantaṃ theraṃ etadavoca:
sn41.3:7.3: “byākaromahaṃ, bhante thera, cittassa gahapatino etaṃ pañhan”ti?
sn41.3:7.4: “Byākarohi tvaṃ, āvuso isidatta, cittassa gahapatino etaṃ pañhan”ti.
sn41.3:7.6: ‘yā imā, bhante thera, anekavihitā diṭṭhiyo loke uppajjanti—
sn41.3:7.8: imā nu kho, bhante, diṭṭhiyo kismiṃ sati honti, kismiṃ asati na hontī’”ti?
sn41.3:7.10: “Yā imā, gahapati, anekavihitā diṭṭhiyo loke uppajjanti:
sn41.3:7.11: ‘sassato lokoti vā, asassato lokoti vā, antavā lokoti vā anantavā lokoti vā, taṃ jīvaṃ taṃ sarīranti vā, aññaṃ jīvaṃ aññaṃ sarīranti vā, hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti vā, na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti vā, hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti vā, neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti vā.
sn41.3:7.12: Yāni cimāni dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhigatāni brahmajāle bhaṇitāni;
sn41.3:7.13: imā kho, gahapati, diṭṭhiyo sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā sati honti, sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā asati na hontī’”ti.
sn41.3:8.2: “Idha, gahapati, assutavā puthujjano ariyānaṃ adassāvī ariyadhammassa akovido ariyadhamme avinīto, sappurisānaṃ adassāvī sappurisadhammassa akovido sappurisadhamme avinīto* rūpaṃ attato samanupassati, rūpavantaṃ vā attānaṃ, attani vā rūpaṃ, rūpasmiṃ vā attānaṃ;
sn41.3:8.6: viññāṇaṃ attato samanupassati, viññāṇavantaṃ vā attānaṃ, attani vā viññāṇaṃ, viññāṇasmiṃ vā attānaṃ.
sn41.3:9.2: “Idha, gahapati, sutavā ariyasāvako ariyānaṃ dassāvī ariyadhammassa kovido ariyadhamme suvinīto sappurisānaṃ dassāvī sappurisadhammassa kovido sappurisadhamme suvinīto na rūpaṃ attato samanupassati, na rūpavantaṃ vā attānaṃ, na attani vā rūpaṃ, na rūpasmiṃ vā attānaṃ;
sn41.3:9.6: na viññāṇaṃ attato samanupassati, na viññāṇavantaṃ vā attānaṃ, na attani vā viññāṇaṃ, na viññāṇasmiṃ vā attānaṃ.
sn41.3:9.7: Evaṃ kho, gahapati, sakkāyadiṭṭhi na hotī”ti.
sn41.3:10.3: “Atthi, bhante, avantiyā isidatto nāma kulaputto amhākaṃ adiṭṭhasahāyo pabbajito?
sn41.3:10.6: “Kahaṃ nu kho so, bhante, āyasmā etarahi viharatī”ti?
sn41.3:10.7: Evaṃ vutte, āyasmā isidatto tuṇhī ahosi.
sn41.3:11.1: Atha kho citto gahapati āyasmato isidattassa bhāsitaṃ abhinanditvā anumoditvā there bhikkhū paṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena sahatthā santappesi sampavāresi.
sn41.3:11.2: Atha kho therā bhikkhū bhuttāvino onītapattapāṇino uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkamiṃsu.
sn41.3:11.3: Atha kho āyasmā thero āyasmantaṃ isidattaṃ etadavoca:
sn41.3:11.4: “sādhu kho taṃ, āvuso isidatta, eso pañho paṭibhāsi.
sn41.3:11.6: Tenahāvuso isidatta, yadā aññathāpi evarūpo pañho āgaccheyya, taññevettha paṭibhāseyyā”ti.
sn41.3:11.7: Atha kho āyasmā isidatto senāsanaṃ saṃsāmetvā pattacīvaramādāya macchikāsaṇḍamhā pakkāmi.
sn41.3:11.8: Yaṃ macchikāsaṇḍamhā pakkāmi, tathā pakkantova ahosi, na puna paccāgacchīti.
